Headline: #87 87th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 87th/Lafyette
ShortDescription: Westbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, State, 83rd, Hollands and 87th: due to, police activity near 87th/Lafyette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Westbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, State, 83rd, Hollands, 87th and over regular route due to police activity near 87th/Lafyette.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Noble
ShortDescription: 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Noble.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Division, Elston and Milwaukee, over normal route, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Noble.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53A South Pulaski Temporary Southbound Reroute near 115th/St. Louis
ShortDescription: Southbound #53A South Pulaski buses are temp rerouted via 115th, Kedzie, 111th & Pulaski into the terminal, due to street blockage near 115th/St. Louis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Kedzie, 111th and Pulaski into the terminal, due to street blockage near 115th/St. Louis.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
